article.title: Trident Systems Incorporated Wins Contract to Design and Develop Information Sharing Capabilities
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Trident Systems Incorporated is being awarded an indefinite delivery/indefinite quantity contract with a maximum of $49.9 million. The contract will provide for the design and development of a multifaceted collaboration capability that encompasses all aspects of information sharing, and it will be designed to meet the U.S. Air Force, Defense Department, Department of Homeland Security and U.S. Intelligence Community's requirements for an information sharing environment. Air Force Research Laboratory/RIKF, Rome, New York, is the contracting activity.
